Write it in.

If you want the editorial to draw attention to a subject, you want to tell me something, send a press release if you have any questions, send us a message right off the website. Messages from the COMMITMENT site are read in writing.If you want us to call you back or write, tell me how you can get in touch.♪ Keep in mind that the messages that come from this page are not published.

In the Volgograd region, holoids cancel the classes and buses.

Society12.02.2024 21:31
Comments0
12.02.2024 21:31

In the Novoanni and Elan districts of the Volgograd region, schoolchildren are waiting for a surprise from the authorities, and the time has come to an end. Some bus routes are also suspended. - Because of the worsening weather conditions, school classes are cancelled to avoid accidents, quoting V102.

Any news? Write and call the editor:+7 (937) 55-66-102
